name: Spring Forth
description:
What is life without sorrow? 

Yuna's simple day-to-day life with her single dad was thrown apart by his sudden demise. But where one door closes, sometimes an another door opens up.

Wishing nothing but for his 'only' child to find happiness & the experiences of a normal girl's normal life, Yuna's father convinced her to leave their home high up in the mountains after he is gone, to start a new life in the city of Asbeth. But to get there, she needs your help!

Help Yuna to find her way to her new life ...
